The prayer should be concluded as usual, and the congregation is dismissed in peace. The candles should be kept lit all night. To prepare for the sanctification prayer of the Myron, the five books of Moses, the books of the major and minor prophets should be read continually in the church all day and night. The Midnight praise should be held in the same church where the Myron sanctification service is held.
